full_text:
SCOPE.

	This article establishes liability for reimbursement of the City’s expenses incurred in connection with corrective action necessitated by violations of the hazardous waste and substance control laws. It also requires preparation of a hazardous materials clearance report before contaminated property is transferred.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

SCOPE. (§ 54.00)

  SCOPE.

	This article establishes liability for reimbursement of the City’s expenses
incurred in connection with corrective action necessitated by violations of the
hazardous waste and substance control laws. It also requires preparation of a
hazardous materials clearance report before contaminated property is
transferred.
